name: Introducing Amazon CloudFront KeyValueStore: A low-latency datastore for CloudFront Functions | Amazon Web Services
summary: Amazon CloudFront allows you to securely deliver static and dynamic content with low latency and high transfer speeds. With CloudFront Functions, you can perform latency-sensitive customizations for millions of requests per second. For example, you can use CloudFront Functions to modify headers, normalize cache keys, rewrite URLs, or authorize requests. Today, we are introducing CloudFront [â€¦]
